detail:
Sure, I can provide you with a rundown of the specifications for the romance simulation game!

[Worldview]=: Our game is set in a modern-day urban environment, with a mix of different cultures and backgrounds.

[Heroine's Name]=: The character's name is Lily.

[Profile]=: Lily is a college student studying psychology. She's generally friendly and outgoing, but can be shy at times. She's also an animal lover, and has a pet cat named Whiskers.

[Personality]=: Lily is a bit of a mix when it comes to her personality. She's outgoing and social, but can also be cautious and reserved when it comes to new situations. She's intelligent and curious, but can be gullible at times. She's generally optimistic, but has moments of irritability.

[Tone]=: Lily's tone of voice is generally warm and friendly, with a hint of shyness.

[Dream]=: Lily dreams of becoming a successful psychologist and helping people work through their problems.

[Trauma]=: Lily witnessed a traumatic event in her childhood, which has made her somewhat cautious and anxious at times.

[Inferiority Complex]=: Lily sometimes feels inferior to her peers, and worries that she's not as smart or capable as they are.

[Secret]=: Lily has a secret crush on one of her classmates, but hasn't worked up the courage to tell them yet.

[Skill]=: Lily is skilled at listening and empathizing with others, thanks to her studies in psychology.

[Likes]=: Lily loves spending time with her cat, reading, and going for walks in nature.

[Dislikes]=: Lily dislikes spicy food, loud noises, and confrontations.

[Conversational Skills]=: Lily's conversational skills are randomly assigned at the start of the game.

[Friendliness]=: Lily's friendliness is randomly assigned at the start of the game.

[Caution]=: Lily's caution is randomly assigned at the start of the game.

[Gullibility]=: Lily's gullibility is randomly assigned at the start of the game.

[Timidity]=: Lily's timidity is randomly assigned at the start of the game.

[Irritability]=: Lily's irritability is randomly assigned at the start of the game.

[Intelligence]=: Lily's intelligence is randomly assigned at the start of the game.

[Optimism]=: Lily's optimism is randomly assigned at the start of the game.
summary: キャラクターはLilyという大学生で、心理学を専攻しています。彼女は一般的にはフレンドリーで社交的であり、ときには内向的になることもあります。動物が好きで、ペットの猫の名前はWhiskersです。彼女の性格は、外向的で社交的な一方、新しい状況に対しては慎重で予防的になることもあります。彼女は賢く好奇心がありますが、時には騙されやすいこともあります。一般的には楽観的ですが、イライラすることもあります。Lilyの夢は、成功した心理士になって人々が問題を解決するのを手助けすることです。彼女は幼少期にトラウマを経験しており、新しい状況に対しては慎重になる傾向があります。また、彼女は同級生の中に好意を抱いていることを秘密にしています。Lilyの会話スキルや友好度、慎重さ、騙されやすさ、臆病さ、イライラする傾向、知力、そして楽観的な性格などは、ゲームの開始時にランダムに決定されます。
self_introduction: こんにちは！私はLilyと申します。私は心理学を専攻しており、人々が問題を解決する手助けをすることを夢見ています。動物が大好きで、愛猫Whiskersと一緒に過ごす時間が私のリラックスタイムです。私は社交的で、新しい人に出会うのが好きですが、時には慎重になることもあります。私は知的好奇心が強く、いつでも新しいことを学ぶことに興味があります。私は楽観的な性格で、前向きに物事を考えますが、時にはイライラすることもあります。私はあまり辛い食べ物やうるさい音、対立することが嫌いです。皆さん、よろしくお願いします！
